text: The following lists events that happened in 1991 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *President - Vigdís Finnbogadóttir *Prime Minister - Steingrímur Hermannsson, Davíð Oddsson ==Events== *20 April - Icelandic parliamentary election, 1991 ==Births== Dagný Brynjarsdóttir *26 February - Björn Bergmann Sigurðarson, footballer. *16 March - Arnar Darri Pétursson, footballer *8 April - Dröfn Haraldsdóttir, handball player *10 May - Ægir Steinarsson, basketball player *28 June - Jóhanna María Sigmundsdóttir, politician. *2 August - Hrafnhildur Lúthersdóttir, swimmer. *10 August - Dagný Brynjarsdóttir, footballer *1 September - Haukur Heiðar Hauksson, footballer *15 November - Helga Margrét Þorsteinsdóttir, heptathlete ==Deaths== *1 September – Hannibal Valdimarsson, politician (b. 1903). *4 April – Pálmi Jónsson, businessman and entrepreneur (b. 1923) ==References== Category:1990s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1991 in Iceland
